stepTitle: Construct a 95% confidence interval for the mean number of hours slept for the population (assumed normal) from which you took the data. $$(8.2$$, $$9.1$$, $$7.7$$, $$8.6$$, $$6.9$$, $$11.2$$, $$10.1$$, $$9.9$$, $$8.9$$, $$9.2$$, $$7.5$$, $$10.5)$$
stepBody: Round answers to two decimal place. Wrap answer with parenthesis, separete by a comma, no spacing.
